name: Reincarnation (Game)
description:
This is a Ludum Dare submission, this is my first game jam, so it is not the greatest, but I had put a lot of effort in it so, I hope you enjoy.

Story:

You are a man who died, but you do not go to heaven nor to hell, insded death itself makes you stay and go throught the same place as punishment for your sins.

Controls:

You move horizontaly with arrow keys, and you can jump with the up arrow. Most of the charceters have their own spin to the movment tho, but the changes in controls should be written in the game.

Ps. The controls aren't very great, so I appologize for any problems you may encounter with the controls.

Support:

If you encounter any feature you think shouldn't be in the game (bugs), you can post a comment on this itch.io page, telling me about it.

You can also suggest other changes to the game as well.

Ludum Dare:

If you want you can look at my ludum dare page at: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/reincarnation, if you want you can rate me as well (if you are looking at this page between 7.10 to 27.10).
